price: ''Rabbinizden bağışlanma dileyin, sonra O’na tevbe edin. Şüphesiz Rabbim çok merhametlidir, çok sevendir.''
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي رَحِيمٞ وَدُودٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi inna rabbī raḥīmun wadūdun
